LanguageData.LTSAnimalAmmoDesc: Whether animals require ammo (true) or can fire indefinitely (false)
LanguageData.LTSExemptWeapon: If checked, this weapon requires ammo.
LanguageData.LTSHideMultipleGizmosDesc: Whether kit gizmos should be hidden when more than one pawn is selected.
LanguageData.LTSMechanoidAmmoDesc: Whether mechanoids require ammo (true) or can fire indefinitely (false)
LanguageData.LTSNoAmmoCategories: There are no ammo mods installed.
LanguageData.LTSNPCLessAmmoDesc: The percentage amount to reduce after having assigned and given ammo to a newly spawned pawn.
LanguageData.LTSPerBulletDesc: Whether firing a weapon consumes ammo per bullet(true) or per burst(false).
LanguageData.LTSUseAmmo: If checked, this weapon can use {0}
LanguageData.LTSDesignatorLootAmmoDesc: Loot ammo from corpses and the wounded.
LanguageData.LTSMessageMustDesignateLootable: Must designate corpse or downed character with a kit.
